A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The amount of modern progressivism in this movie left a bad taste in my mouth. Subtle political points are one thing\, but this was insane. It was 100% obvious and annoying.

Why did you have to take such an innocent franchise like Star Wars and turn it into a platform. Not to mention the amount of disrespect to the prior movies and it's characters. You destroyed characters that have stood the test of time\, and who are beloved by millions. Rey is completely boring as a hero. She's just automatically great at everything with no work or effort required. Kylo Ren is not menacing as a villain. The whole thing is just boring and I could care less what happens.

As far as I'm concerned\, Star Wars ended with Return of the Jedi.
